actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project for construction of a bridge to replace the Fuller Warren Bridge in Jacksonville, Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to construct a bridge to replace the Fuller Warren Bridge in Jacksonville, Florida. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway demonstration project for construction of a bridge to replace the Fuller Warren Bridge in Jacksonville, Florida.
